fulltext:
PERSONAL INFORMATION  
 Name 
: CHUNG NGHIEP CHUONG 
 Date of birth 
: February16th, 1990 
 Address 
: 119Binh Long Street, Ward Binh 
Hung Hoa A, District Binh Tan, Ho Chi Minh City. 
 Mobile 
: (+84) 9.38.28.37.38 
 Email 
:chuongchung.it@gmail.com 
PERSONAL PROFILE / OBJECTIVES 
My goal is to become a highly-skilled Software Developer. I am a creative 
and studious person with high a great sense of self-development. With over 
3 years of experience in C#.Net, ASP.Net MVC, SQL Server,HTML,CSS, 
Javascript & a hard-working attitude, I am confident that I am capable of 
making a valuable contribution to the company. 
EDUCATION AND AWARDS 
 09/2010 – 08/2014: 
o HUTECH University – HCM City, Vietnam.  
o My major is Computer Science. 
o Graduation Year: 2014 
WORKING EXPERIENCES 
 2017 – 2019 :official staff of FPT Telecome Limited Company 
Position: Software Developer 
Project name 1: The Inside System 
Project Description: The Inside is professional software which 
can solve problems such as Payroll and managing human resources 
of a particular company with 2 specified modules. 
 Payroll: Salary calculation system. After calculating time & 
attendance tracking, employees’ monthly salary will be 
automatically computed and generated into reports. 
 Human Resource: Human Resource Management system 
helps manage all departments and the total number of 
employees of a company. 
Responsibilities: 
 System Maintenance 
 Customer Requirements Analysis  
 Coding and unit testing 
Team size: 10 people 
Technologies Used: 
Programming Language 
 C#, ASP.NET MVC 4, HTML, CSS, Javascript 
Software environment 
 .NET Framework 
Development tools  
 Visual Studio 2010 
 SQL Server 2008 
 Hardware environment 
 Window7. 
Project name 2: The Retail MANSystem 
Project Description: Build a website to manage the MAN systems 
through software interface. 
Responsibilities:  
 Customer Requirements Analysis  
 Coding and unit testing 
Team size: 10 people 
Technologies Used: 
Programming Language 
 ASP.NET MVC 4 
Software environment 
 .NET Framework 4.5 
Development tools  
 Visual Studio 2013 
 SQL Server 2012 
 Hardware environment 
 Window 7, Window 8 
 2015 – 2016: TVNET Company 
Position: Software Developer 
Project name:  
Description: Build a website based on framework ASP.NET      
Webform of Company. 
Responsibilities:  
 Analyze the requirement 
 Design prototype 
 Coding and unit testing 
 Edit layout and convert layout from psd to html/css basic 
level. 
Team size: 3 people 
Technologies Used: 
Programming Language 
 C#,ASP.NET, HTML, CSS, Javascript. 
Development tools

Hardware environment
